Address.value: 5438 WADE PARK BOULEVARD,SUITE 600, RALEIGH, North Carolina, 27607, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Vontier, spun off from Fortive in 2020, is an industrial technology company with a portfolio of transportation and mobility solutions. The company offers a wide array of products and services, including fueling equipment, sensors, point-of-sale and payment systems, telematics, and equipment used by vehicle mechanics and technicians. Vontier generated approximately $3 billion in sales and $582 million in operating profit in 2021.
